entry.name: windowOpacityPercentage
entry.label: Window Opacity (%)
entry.description: Set how transparent windows should be (lower = more transparent)

entry.name: excludedWindows
entry.description: Comma-separated list of window classes to exclude from transparency

entry.name: showNewWindowNames
entry.label: Show new window names in logs
entry.description: When enabled, prints resourceClass/resourceName/caption when a new window appears

entry.name: showDebugLogs
entry.label: Display debug logs
entry.description: When enabled, it prints messages about how the cache is being used, among other things
